## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have run the linter (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] My code builds successfully (`npm run build`)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added examples or usage instructions (if applicable)

### Testing

- [ ] I have tested this in development mode (`npm run dev`)
- [ ] I have tested the production build (`npm run build && npm run preview`)
- [ ] I have tested in multiple browsers
- [ ] I have tested on mobile (if UI changes)
- [ ] I have checked for console errors

### Scientific Rigor (for research contributions)

- [ ] Changes align with pre-registered protocol
- [ ] Theoretical justification provided
- [ ] Falsification criteria considered
- [ ] References added where appropriate
- [ ] Not applicable (non-scientific change)

### PWA (if relevant)

- [ ] PWA still installs correctly
- [ ] Service worker updates properly
- [ ] Offline functionality works
- [ ] Manifest is valid
- [ ] Not applicable
